They all rate Amazon tv fairly and always very high.Ease of use - yes, lots of viewing options - yes (with Prime), affordable - yesIt also if very flexible in being able to add other streaming services like Hulu, Netflix, etc. Provides point of access to whatever streaming services you haveOne step closer to cutting the Uverse cord
